email.incomingsupport.body1.en: A customer has sent the following info

email.secret_link.link_works_once.en: This link will only work once. After viewing, the secret will be permanently deleted.
email.secret_link.link_works_once.translation: Cxi tiu ligilo funkcios nur unufoje. Post vidado, la sekreto estos permanente forigita.

email.welcome.subject.en: Welcome to %{product_name} - Please verify your email
email.welcome.subject.translation: Bonvenon al %{product_name} - Bonvolu konfirmi vian retadreso

email.welcome.verify_prompt.en: Please verify your email address by clicking the link below:
email.welcome.verify_prompt.translation: Bonvolu konfirmi vian retadreson alklakante la ligilon sube:

email.welcome.copy_link_prompt.en: Or copy and paste this link:
email.welcome.copy_link_prompt.translation: Aux kopiu kaj algluu cxi tiun ligilon:

email.welcome.postscript.en: P.S. This email was sent to %{email_address}. If you did not create an account, you can safely ignore this message.
email.welcome.postscript.translation: P.S. Cxi tiu retposxto estis sendita al %{email_address}. Se vi ne kreis konton, vi povas sekure ignori cxi tiun mesagxon.

email.password_request.request_notice.en: We received a request to reset your password for %{product_name}.
email.password_request.request_notice.translation: Ni ricevis peton por restarigi vian pasvorton por %{product_name}.

email.password_request.copy_link_prompt.en: Or copy and paste this link:
email.password_request.copy_link_prompt.translation: Aux kopiu kaj algluu cxi tiun ligilon:

email.password_request.ignore_notice.en: If you did not request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.
email.password_request.ignore_notice.translation: Se vi ne petis pasvortan restarigon, vi povas sekure ignori cxi tiun retposxton.

email.password_request.postscript.en: P.S. This email was sent to %{email_address}.
email.password_request.postscript.translation: P.S. Cxi tiu retposxto estis sendita al %{email_address}.

email.magic_link.request_notice.en: You requested a login link for your %{product_name} account.
email.magic_link.request_notice.translation: Vi petis ensalutan ligilon por via %{product_name} konto.

email.magic_link.copy_link_prompt.en: Or copy and paste this link:
email.magic_link.copy_link_prompt.translation: Aux kopiu kaj algluu cxi tiun ligilon:

email.magic_link.expiration_notice.en: This link will expire in 15 minutes.
email.magic_link.expiration_notice.translation: Cxi tiu ligilo senvalidigas post 15 minutoj.

email.magic_link.ignore_notice.en: If you did not request this link, you can safely ignore this email.
email.magic_link.ignore_notice.translation: Se vi ne petis cxi tiun ligilon, vi povas sekure ignori cxi tiun retposxton.

email.magic_link.postscript.en: P.S. This email was sent to %{email_address}.
email.magic_link.postscript.translation: P.S. Cxi tiu retposxto estis sendita al %{email_address}.

email.incoming_secret.someone_sent.en: Someone has sent you a secure message through %{display_domain}.
email.incoming_secret.someone_sent.translation: Iu sendis al vi sekuran mesagxon per %{display_domain}.

email.incoming_secret.view_instructions.en: To view this secret, click the link below:
email.incoming_secret.view_instructions.translation: Por vidi cxi tiun sekreton, alklaku la ligilon sube:

email.incoming_secret.link_works_once.en: This link will only work once. After viewing, the secret will be permanently deleted.
email.incoming_secret.link_works_once.translation: Cxi tiu ligilo funkcios nur unufoje. Post vidado, la sekreto estos permanente forigita.

email.secret_revealed.automated_notice.en: This is an automated notification. No action is required.
email.secret_revealed.automated_notice.translation: Cxi tio estas auxtomata sciigo. Neniu ago estas bezonata.

email.expiration_warning.subject.en: Your secret link will expire soon

email.expiration_warning.expires_in.en: Your secret link will expire in %{time_remaining}

email.expiration_warning.view_button.en: View your secret before it expires
email.expiration_warning.view_button.translation: Vidi vian sekreton antaux ol gxi senvalidigas

email.expiration_warning.after_expiratio.en: After expiration, the secret will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
email.expiration_warning.after_expiratio.translation: Post senvalidigxo, la sekreto estos permanente forigita kaj ne reakireblaj.

email.expiration_warning.view_before_gon.translation: Vidu gxin antaux ol gxi forigas:

email.expiration_warning.after_expiratio.en: After expiration, the secret will be permanently deleted.
email.expiration_warning.after_expiratio.translation: Post senvalidigxo, la sekreto estos permanente forigita.

email.organization_invitation.body.en: %{inviter_email} has invited you to join "%{organization_name}" as %{role_description}.

email.organization_invitation.link_instr.en: Or copy and paste this link:
email.organization_invitation.link_instr.translation: Aux kopiu kaj algluu cxi tiun ligilon:

email.organization_invitation.expiry_not.en: This invitation will expire in %{days} days.
email.organization_invitation.expiry_not.translation: Cxi tiu invito senvalidigas post %{days} tagoj.

email.organization_invitation.decline_in.en: If you don't want to join, you can simply ignore this email or decline the invitation.
email.organization_invitation.decline_in.translation: Se vi ne volas aligxi, vi povas simple ignori cxi tiun retposxton aux malakcepti la inviton.

email.organization_invitation.postscript.en: P.S. This email was sent to %{invited_email}. If you weren't expecting this invitation, you can safely ignore this message.
email.organization_invitation.postscript.translation: P.S. Cxi tiu retposxto estis sendita al %{invited_email}. Se vi ne atendis cxi tiun inviton, vi povas sekure ignori cxi tiun mesagxon.

email.password_changed.body.en: Your password for %{product_name} was changed on %{date} at %{time}.
email.password_changed.body.translation: Via pasvorto por %{product_name} estis sxangxita je %{date} je %{time}.

email.password_changed.security_notice.en: If you did not make this change, please secure your account immediately by resetting your password and contacting support.
email.password_changed.security_notice.translation: Se vi ne faris cxi tiun sxangxon, bonvolu tuj sekurigi vian konton per restarigado de via pasvorto kaj kontaktante subtenon.

email.email_changed.body.en: The email address for your %{product_name} account was changed to %{new_email_masked} on %{date}.
email.email_changed.body.translation: La retadreso por via %{product_name} konto estis sxangxita al %{new_email_masked} je %{date}.

email.email_changed.security_notice.en: If you did not make this change, please contact support immediately as your account may be compromised.
email.email_changed.security_notice.translation: Se vi ne faris cxi tiun sxangxon, bonvolu tuj kontakti subtenon, cxar via konto eble estas kompromitita.

email.email_change_confirmation.body.en: Please verify this email address to complete the change for your %{product_name} account.
email.email_change_confirmation.body.translation: Bonvolu konfirmi cxi tiun retadreson por kompletigi la sxangxon por via %{product_name} konto.

email.email_change_confirmation.copy_lin.en: Or copy and paste this link:
email.email_change_confirmation.copy_lin.translation: Aux kopiu kaj algluu cxi tiun ligilon:

email.mfa_enabled.body.en: Two-factor authentication was enabled for your %{product_name} account on %{date}.
email.mfa_enabled.body.translation: Dufaktora auxtentigxo estis ebligita por via %{product_name} konto je %{date}.

email.mfa_enabled.security_notice.en: Your account is now more secure. You will need to enter a verification code from your authenticator app when signing in.
email.mfa_enabled.security_notice.translation: Via konto nun estas pli sekura. Vi bezonos enigi konfirmokodon de via auxtentigxilo-aplikajxo kiam vi ensalutas.

email.mfa_disabled.body.en: Two-factor authentication was disabled for your %{product_name} account on %{date}.
email.mfa_disabled.body.translation: Dufaktora auxtentigxo estis malebligita por via %{product_name} konto je %{date}.

email.mfa_disabled.warning_notice.en: Your account is now less secure. If you did not make this change, please secure your account immediately.
email.mfa_disabled.warning_notice.translation: Via konto nun estas malpli sekura. Se vi ne faris cxi tiun sxangxon, bonvolu tuj sekurigi vian konton.

email.new_login_alert.body.en: A new sign-in to your %{product_name} account was detected on %{date} at %{time}.
email.new_login_alert.body.translation: Nova ensaluto al via %{product_name} konto estis detektita je %{date} je %{time}.

email.new_login_alert.not_you_notice.en: If this wasn't you, your account may be compromised.
email.new_login_alert.not_you_notice.translation: Se cxi tio ne estis vi, via konto eble estas kompromitita.

email.member_removed.body.en: You have been removed from the organization "%{organization_name}" on %{product_name}.
email.member_removed.body.translation: Vi estis forigita el la organizo "%{organization_name}" cxe %{product_name}.

email.role_changed.body.en: Your role in "%{organization_name}" has been changed from %{old_role} to %{new_role}.
email.role_changed.body.translation: Via rolo en "%{organization_name}" estis sxangxita de %{old_role} al %{new_role}.

email.organization_deleted.body.en: The organization "%{organization_name}" has been deleted from %{product_name}. All associated data has been removed.
email.organization_deleted.body.translation: La organizo "%{organization_name}" estis forigita el %{product_name}. Cxiuj rilataj datumoj estis forigitaj.

email.payment_receipt.body.en: Thank you for your payment. Here are your payment details:
email.payment_receipt.body.translation: Dankon pro via pago. Jen viaj pagaj detaloj:

email.payment_failed.body.en: We were unable to process your payment for %{product_name}. Please update your payment method to avoid service interruption.
email.payment_failed.body.translation: Ni ne povis procezi vian pagon por %{product_name}. Bonvolu auxdatigi vian pagmetodon por eviti servointerrompon.

email.trial_expiring.body.en: Your free trial of %{product_name} will expire in %{days_remaining} days. Upgrade now to keep access to all features.
email.trial_expiring.body.translation: Via senpaga provo de %{product_name} senvalidigas post %{days_remaining} tagoj. Auxgradu nun por konservi aliron al cxiuj funkcioj.

email.subscription_changed.body.en: Your %{product_name} subscription has been changed from %{old_plan} to %{new_plan}.
email.subscription_changed.body.translation: Via %{product_name} abono estis sxangxita de %{old_plan} al %{new_plan}.
